item.description:
Update:

Hi -For those who can meet even though impromptu, let's try another easy on the budget Longy School of Music concert. It starts at 8pm but it would be fun to have dinner together first. We will have dinner in the neighborhood (Cafe of India on 52 Brattle ). We'll meet at 5:45 and please bring a $1 donation towards the cost of this group's membership fees.

About the music: it will be the Faculty Artist Recital of Delvyn Case, composer.

Be well. Hope to see some of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Susan Collins' table at 5:45
item.name: Dinner Together at Cafe of India; Longy School of Music - Faculty Artist Recital
